SENT.plain: Congenital abnormalities in bovine fetuses submitted for SBV surveillance Cardiomyopathy due to selenium/vitamin E deficiency diagnosed in Boer goat kids Osteochondrosis manifesting at weaning in young sows Mycotic pneumonia in pheasant and turkey poults Listeriosis and toxoplasmosis diagnosed in red squirrels These are among matters discussed in the Animal Health and Veterinary Laboratories Agency's (AHVLA's) disease surveillance report for June
